ComicInfo.Summary:
Justin Jordan unleashes a vision of bleak horror as the group known as the Storm tries to hold back the forces that claw at your nightmares. This is the return of the Dark Gods! Tiamet has her children spreading carnage and preparing for her return!
Available with Wraparound cover from series artist German Erramouspe, sultry Siren cover from Christian Zanier, Regular and a Fully-Painted Deity cover by Michael DiPascale, and a special Nightmare Retailer Order Incentive cover also by Zanier.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |---------|------------------------------------------|-------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Michael DiPascale | 1 | | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | German Erramouspe | 2 | | Siren | Siren Cover | Christian Zanier | 3 | | Painted | Fully-Painted Deity Cover | Michael DiPascale | 4 | | RI | Nightmare Retailer Order Incentive Cover | German Erramouspe | 5 |
